```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)

mygitpath <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bklingen/DataViz2020_Maps/master/CoronaCases.csv'
corona <- read_csv(mygitpath)
corona

regions <- map_data("county")
regions <- filter(regions, region=="florida")

coronanum <- corona %>% count(County)
regionsnum <- regions %>% count(subregion)

coronanum$County <- tolower(coronanum$County)

corona3 <- regions %>% left_join(coronanum, by=c("subregion"="County"))

ggplot(corona3, aes(x=long, y=lat, group= group, fill=n)) + 
  geom_polygon(color="black", size= 0.5) +theme_minimal() +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  labs(title = "COVID-19 Spread in Florida", fill="Number of Cases")
                                 
```
